plants-note.title: Monthly Plant Note :

mode.title: Grow Your Garden Warm and Full ‚Äî with Two Unique Modes

miniMode.title: üåø Mini Mode

Watch your whole garden come together.

reward.title: Harvest crops to collect seeds and decorate your own garden!
reward.description:
When you pick fruits or flowers, you‚Äôll earn seeds. 
Use them to buy backgrounds, pots, and special items. 
Collect them all and make your garden truly yours!
